isPrime=lambda x: all(x % i != 0 for i in range(int(x**0.5)+1)[2:])
def ispal(x):
    return x == x[::-1]
n = int(raw_input())
if not n % 2: n += 1
if n > 98689:
    print 1003001
else:    
    for i in range(n, 100000, 2):
        if isPrime(i) and ispal(str(i)):
            print i
            break
